featured.text: Recently, however, the International Olive Council (IOC) is seeking input on test methods to improve the transparency of the testing process and boost the accuracy of the results.

definition.zh_def: 輸入的行為或過程，通常指將數據或信息輸入到系統或設備中。
definition.en_def: The act or process of putting data or information into a system or device.
definition.example: Please input your password to access the account.
